lines.text: The Go Wizard could've opened up a hole in something with a source of flame?
Like, maybe into the building's wiring, so some sparks would...
Wait, no. That's not how it works. <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole</c> <c=#FF00FF>doesn't damage what it's cast through.</c>
I think the Go Wizard had a <c=#FF00FF>simpler way</c> to start a fire on him.
